description: From New Latin Xanthochroi (from ξανθός (xanthós, “fair", "yellow", "golden", "blond”) + χρώς (khrṓs, “skin”)) + -ic.

adjectives.description: xanthochroic (comparative more xanthochroic, superlative most xanthochroic)

entries.meaning: pertaining to people or races with light hair and pale complexions
